name: Diary of A Wimpy Kid: The Game
name_original: Diary of A Wimpy Kid: The Game
description:
It's not a diary, it's a game!

Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Game features characters from the titular book series of the same name! Play as Greg Heffley, as he tries to desperately get higher on the popularity chart on school.  Play through several situations, where your choices matter! You can fail, you can succeed and you can destroy friendships! Based on the book series of the same name, this is an unofficial love letter to the books. 

Features

  • Looks just like the book!
  • Make choices!
  • Fail and pay the price!
  • Including 4 endings!
  • Features characters from the books!
  • Very much story driven!

(This is NOT an official diary of a wimpy kid project. This is simply a project made by me for fun and to pay tribute to the books!)

This game is probably one of the most complex games I have ever made and I’m really happy I got it done! Enjoy Diary of A Wimpy Kid: The Game!
